Requirement: Unarmed or a weapon with the Unarmed trait.

You put yourself into a wide, stable stance and ready your fists for punching rather than defending. This stance cares only about you hitting hard; taking a few hits is worth the trouble.

Pros

Fist Fighter

  • Your unarmed damage die is 1d6.
Slug
  • Your first unarmed attack each turn deals 1d10 bludgeoning damage.
Haymaker
  • As an action, you can throw out a single, powerful swing. One creature within reach must make a Strength (Save) check of DC 10 + your Proficiency Bonus or take 1d12 + Strength modifier bludgeoning damage. The creature takes half damage on success.
Punching Bag
  • You are resistant to bludgeoning damage.

Cons

Un-dodging

  • Your AC is reduced by -2.
Sluggish
  • Your movement speed is 5ft slower.
